item.title: Clarion Partners Invests in Bozeman's Highmark Development to Address Housing Needs
item.description: Clarion Partners’ investment in Highmark, a 162-unit development in Bozeman, Montana, aims to meet the growing demand for affordable housing near Montana State University and Downtown Bozeman, leveraging the area’s Qualified Opportunity Zone status.
